A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was horrid--PC/social justice warrior/garbage.  Rain Johnson basically turned a wonderful franchise into something unrecognizable.  He and Disney killed Star Wars and are now becoming enormously wealthy from its rotting corpse.  From poor script\, stupid jokes\, plot holes the size of galaxies\, and wasted characters (Luke's treatment was unforgivable) I wish that I would have never given my hard earned money to these (Disney) wealthy scum.
